name: User can close archived channel
precondition:
Important

Ensure that `Allow users to view archived channels` is enabled on the server and some public and private archived channels exist
(Setting can be found in System Console under "Users and Teams")

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Close channel
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
1. Open a channel that's not the town square
2. Search for a post in an archived channel
3. Open the archived channel by selecting Jump from search results and then selecting the link to move to the most recent posts in the channel
4. Close an archived channel by clicking "Close Channel" button in the footer
5. Repeat steps 1 to 3 (N/A for RN)
6. Click the header menu and select Close Channel (N/A for RN)
inline.expectedResult: 4. and 6. The user is returned to the channel they were previously viewing and the archived channel is removed from the drawer

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Won't Do) User is not returned to Town Square when archiving a channel — MM-13486

inline.description: 1. Add text to channel you land on (after closing the archived channel via Close Channel button)

customFields.Related ticket(s): RN: Tapping on Close Channel while viewing archived disables keyboard clicks on post text box — MM-22905
